ingredients: +   1/2 cup white sugar,   +   1/2 cup margarine, softened, 2  eggs, 2   +   3/4 cups all-purpose flour, 1   +   1/2 teaspoons baking powder,   +   1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1   +   1/2 cups mashed ripe bananas, 1 cup plums, pitted and chopped
nutrition: Total Fat 9g 11%, Saturated Fat 2g 8%, Cholesterol 31mg 10%, Sodium 214mg 9%, Total Carbohydrate 39g 14%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 13g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 4mg 19%, Calcium 48mg 4%, Iron 2mg 9%, Potassium 168mg 4%
